about_the_game:
Strange phenomena occur one after another in one apartment.
You, an exorcist, are asked to investigate and go to the room, but you are trapped by the spirits living in the room.
The only way to escape is to suppress all the spiritual phenomena caused by the spirits.
However, even after pasting the amulet, many fears attack you...

Don't overlook spiritual phenomena.

If you discover a spiritual phenomenon, please attach an amulet and light a candle at the entrance.

If no spiritual phenomena are occurring, light a candle without pasting the amulet.

Please calm down the 7 spiritual phenomena without making a single mistake.

About “Ghost room”

Ghost room is a short horror game similar to The Exit 8 and I'm on Observation Duty, in which you suppress all the spiritual phenomena that occur in the room and aim to escape.

Genre: The Exit 8-like horror
Play time: Approximately 20 to 60 minutes
Operation method: Keyboard/mouse (controller not supported)
Number of endings: 1
Difficulty: Low

〇 Live commentary is welcome for this game. If you like it, please play it and let us know what you think in the live video!
*Estimated live broadcast time: approximately 30 to 90 minutes
〇 When distributing or reviewing the game, please be sure to purchase the game yourself or as a gift (no keys will be distributed).
〇Please write "Ghost room" somewhere in the title of the video.
〇Please write the author's X account in the video summary field.
